verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G3606><s%>, <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of a <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2821>calling<s%>, <S%G2657>consider<s%> the <S%G652>Apostle<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> High <S%G749>Priest<s%> <S%G3671>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3671>confession<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>;

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3778>he<s%> hath been counted <S%G515>worthy<s%> <S%G1391>of<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, <S%G2596>by<s%> so much <S%G3745>as<s%> he that <S%G2680>built<s%> the <S%G846>house<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> than the <S%G3624>house<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G2680>builded<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1161>one<s%>; but he that <S%G2680>built<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> is <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> was <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2324>servant<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of those things which were afterward to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%>, <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> are <S%G2070>we<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> hold <S%G2722>fast<s%> our <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2745>glorying<s%> of our <S%G1680>hope<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>.

Harden <S%G4645><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3894>provocation<s%>, Like as <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G3986>trial<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>,

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I was <S%G4360>displeased<s%> with <S%G1565>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%>, <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, They <S%G4105>do<s%> <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G4105>err<s%> <S%G2588>in<s%> their <S%G2588>heart<s%>: <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1097>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>;

Take <S%G991>heed<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3379>lest<s%> haply there shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> one of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2588>an<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G570>unbelief<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> falling <S%G868>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> <S%G3870>exhort<s%> one another1438, 1538 <S%G2596>day<s%> by <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G891>so<s%> <S%G3739>long<s%> as it is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4594>To-day<s%>; <S%G3363>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> be <S%G4645>hardened<s%> by the <S%G539>deceitfulness<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G2722>hold<s%> fast the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of our <S%G5287>confidence<s%> <S%G949>firm<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>:

while <S%G1722><s%> it is <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G4594>To-day<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> ye shall <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G4645>Harden<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3894>provocation<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5100>who<s%>, when they <S%G191>heard<s%>, did <S%G3893>provoke<s%>? <S%G235>nay<s%>, did <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they that <S%G1831>came<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G125>Egypt<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G5101>whom<s%> was he <S%G4360>displeased<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>? was it <S%G3780>not<s%> with them that <S%G264>sinned<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2966>bodies<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> to <S%G5101>whom<s%> sware <S%G3660>he<s%> <S%G3361>that<s%> they <S%G1525>should<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2663>rest<s%>, but1487, 3361 to them that were <S%G544>disobedient<s%>?
And <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G1410>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> able to enter <S%G1525>in<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%>.
